languages.text: "О, шерин, я бы с радостью отдала жемчуг всех океанов и россыпь небесных звезд, чтобы не оказаться сейчас на своем месте. Увы". {n}Джай пытается бодриться, но получается плохо.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "О, шерин, я бы с радостью отдала жемчуг всех океанов и россыпь небесных звезд, чтобы не оказаться сейчас на своем месте. Увы". {n}Джай пытается бодриться, но получается плохо.{/n}

languages.text: "Oh, shereen, I would gladly give up every pearl from every ocean and the light of every star in the sky to be anyone but myself at this moment. But alas." {n}Jae is trying to perk herself up, but it's not working out too well.{/n}
languages.original_text: "О, шерин, я бы с радостью отдала жемчуг всех океанов и россыпь небесных звезд, чтобы не оказаться сейчас на своем месте. Увы". {n}Джай пытается бодриться, но получается плохо.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Oh, shereen, I would gladly give away the pearls from all oceans and the light of every star in the sky to avoid ending up where I am now. Alas." {n}Jae is trying to perk herself up, but it's not working out too well.{/n}

"Oh, shereen, I would gladly give away the pearls from all oceans and the light of every star in the sky to avoid ending up where I am now. Alas." {n}Jae is trying to perk herself up, but it's not working out too well.{/n}

"Oh, shereen, I would gladly give up every pearl from every ocean and the light of every star in the sky to just not be here. Alas." {n}Jae is trying to perk herself up, but it's not working out too well.{/n}

"Oh, shereen, I would gladly give up every pearl from every ocean and the light of every star in the sky to just not be here. Alas." {n}Jae is trying to perk herself up, but it's not working out too well.{/n}

"Oh, shereen, I would gladly give up every pearl from every ocean and the light of every star in the sky to be anyone but myself at this moment. But alas." {n}Jae is trying to perk herself up, but it's not working out too well.{/n}

languages.text: “噢，亲爱的，要是能让那个该死的家伙别再纠缠我，就算要我放弃海洋里所有的珍珠与群星所有的明光，我都愿意。但很遗憾，这件事情我好像说了不算。”{n}婕伊试着让自己振作起来，但似乎不太有效果。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Oh, shereen, I would gladly give up every pearl from every ocean and the light of every star in the sky to be anyone but myself at this moment. But alas." {n}Jae is trying to perk herself up, but it's not working out too well.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “噢，亲爱的，要是能让那个该死的家伙别再纠缠我，就算要我放弃海洋里所有的珍珠与群星所有的明光，我都愿意。但很遗憾，这件事情我好像说了不算。”{n}婕伊试着让自己振作起来，但似乎不太有效果。{/n}

languages.text: « Oh, shereen, je renoncerais volontiers à toutes les perles de l'océan et à la lumière de toutes les étoiles pour être n'importe qui d'autre à cet instant. Malheureusement... » {n}Jae essaie de se remonter le moral, mais n'y parvient pas vraiment.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Oh, shereen, I would gladly give up every pearl from every ocean and the light of every star in the sky to be anyone but myself at this moment. But alas." {n}Jae is trying to perk herself up, but it's not working out too well.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Oh, shereen, je renoncerais volontiers à toutes les perles de l'océan et à la lumière de toutes les étoiles pour être n'importe qui d'autre à cet instant. Malheureusement... » {n}Jae essaie de se remonter le moral, mais n'y parvient pas vraiment.{/n}

languages.text: «Ay, shereen, daría gustosamente cada perla de cada océano existente y la luz de cada estrella del cielo solo para ser cualquier otra persona ahora mismo. Por desgracia, no tengo esa suerte». {n}Jae intenta animarse, pero no lo está logrando.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Oh, shereen, I would gladly give up every pearl from every ocean and the light of every star in the sky to be anyone but myself at this moment. But alas." {n}Jae is trying to perk herself up, but it's not working out too well.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Ay, shereen, daría gustosamente cada perla de cada océano existente y la luz de cada estrella del cielo solo para ser cualquier otra persona ahora mismo. Por desgracia, no tengo esa suerte». {n}Jae intenta animarse, pero no lo está logrando.{/n}

languages.text: 「シェリーン、ここを去ることができるなら、すべての海の真珠も、空のすべての星の光も、喜んであきらめるよ」{n}ジェイは自分を奮い立たせようとしているが、あまりうまくいっていない。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Oh, shereen, I would gladly give up every pearl from every ocean and the light of every star in the sky to be anyone but myself at this moment. But alas." {n}Jae is trying to perk herself up, but it's not working out too well.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「シャリーン、ここを去ることができるなら、すべての海の真珠も、空のすべての星の光も、喜んであきらめるよ」{n}ジェイは自分を奮い立たせようとしているが、あまりうまくいっていない。{/n}

languages.text: "Oh, Shereen, ich würde wirklich jede Perle von jedem Ozean und das Licht eines jeden Sterns am Himmel aufgeben, um nicht hier sein zu müssen. Ein Jammer." {n}Jae versucht sich selbst aufzuheitern, aber so richtig schafft sie es nicht.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Oh, shereen, I would gladly give up every pearl from every ocean and the light of every star in the sky to just not be here. Alas." {n}Jae is trying to perk herself up, but it's not working out too well.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Oh, Shereen, ich würde wirklich jede Perle von jedem Ozean und das Licht eines jeden Sterns am Himmel aufgeben, um nicht hier sein zu müssen. Ein Jammer." {n}Jae versucht sich selbst aufzuheitern, aber so richtig schafft sie es nicht.{/n}

languages.text: "Şirinim... Şimdi başka biri olabilmek için gökteki her yıldızın ışığını seve seve feda eder, okyanustaki her inciyi gözümü kırpmadan verirdim. Fakat nafile." {n}Jae, kendini neşelendirmeye çalışsa da fayda etmiyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Oh, shereen, I would gladly give up every pearl from every ocean and the light of every star in the sky to be anyone but myself at this moment. But alas." {n}Jae is trying to perk herself up, but it's not working out too well.{/n}
